review: This product is really, really, good. The only one thing that I don't like is that it doesn't have a built in Roku like feature. Which is casting. Other than that, it packs with nexus 5 specs, which is crazy for $99. I'd rather gave this a 4.5/5, but it doesn't let me, so I'll give it a 4/5. This really is a good TV system. If you are considering to buy this, you won't regret. It's just that you need a work around app that takes a little bit more step in order to cast things from my phone.

review: Not worth it.  There are too many things I don't like about it.  I have an Xbox, BD player, AV receiver, TV, all with apps. Not only was I wrong, (does not have all the popular aps and instead has a lot of garbage apps) but the experience is awful.
